thread.title: Watch: Taapsee Pannu steals the limelight from Akshay Kumar in 'Naam shabana' trailer | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Watch: Taapsee Pannu steals the limelight from Akshay Kumar in 'Naam shabana' trailer | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Watch: Taapsee Pannu steals the limelight from Akshay Kumar in 'Naam shabana' trailer | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

organizations.name: hindi movie news - times of india

text:
After a power-packed performance with Shoojit Sircar's 'Pink', Taapsee Pannu is back and how. The actress, who takes the spotlight in Neeraj Pandey 's 'Naam Shabana' has not left any stone unturned to bring life to her character in the film. 

The over two-minute long trailer sees the versatile actor Manoj Bajpayee narrating a gist of the storyline which then takes us to the character narration of Taapsee a.k.a Shabana. Taapsee gets her hands on one of the major projects handled by the secret forces for which she had to move overseas. When asked if someone's there to support her and give her company, Manoj proudly proclaims that he has sent the "best of the best" from his team. Here comes Akshay Kumar I'm total swag. He channels the angry young man rather well. 

The trailer looks rather promising. The film is being touted to be a prequel to Akshay Kumar's 2015 hit 'Baby.'
